ServerGroup.Name: Dishong Tower
ServerGroup.Description: Can you escape the Dishong Tower?

Server.Name: Dishong Tower
Server.Description:
The Dishong Tower Challenge: Can you survive and escape the Dishong Tower, using nothing but what you can scavenge from the tower itself? You have one life, one mission, one means of escape.
Contributors: DishongGameOptions -Author: w00kien00kie Cleaner HUD -Author: Frantic_Dan Khelldon Custom Menu -Author: Khelldon WMMAvoidBloodmoon -Author: w00kien00kie WMMLootRespawnTweak -Author: w00kien00kie WMMStashBackpack -Author: w00kien00kie
For full details, check the forum post here: https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/34098-the-dishong-tower-challenge-updated-for-alpha-21/
